dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: The way he acts mainly, demons and the like walk around with this sense of entitlement that others canâ€™t even understand.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Well thinking on Lucci that is probably true.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Why are you asking Takeshi-Kun? Do you not trust me?
